title: How some doc files are generated?
body_html:
I'm reading the doc files of the pytorch. And I know a little about the sphinx.

But when I see this doc file, I couldn't find the corresponding source file from which this doc file is generated. For example, the content below seems like it is written by hand directly in the tensors.rst file

.. class:: Tensor()

   There are a few main ways to create a tensor, depending on your use case.

   - To create a tensor with pre-existing data, use :func:`torch.tensor`.
   - To create a tensor with specific size, use ``torch.*`` tensor creation
     ops (see :ref:`tensor-creation-ops`).
   - To create a tensor with the same size (and similar types) as another tensor,
     use ``torch.*_like`` tensor creation ops
     (see :ref:`tensor-creation-ops`).
   - To create a tensor with similar type but different size as another tensor,
     use ``tensor.new_*`` creation ops.

Is all the content in this doc file written by hand?

Thank you!

Thank you!
body:
I'm reading the doc files of the [pytorch](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/tensors.html). And I know a little about the sphinx.

But when I see [this doc file](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/tensors.html), I couldn't find the corresponding source file from which this doc file is generated.  For example,  the content below seems like it is written by hand directly in the `tensors.rst` file

```
.. class:: Tensor()

   There are a few main ways to create a tensor, depending on your use case.

   - To create a tensor with pre-existing data, use :func:`torch.tensor`.
   - To create a tensor with specific size, use ``torch.*`` tensor creation
     ops (see :ref:`tensor-creation-ops`).
   - To create a tensor with the same size (and similar types) as another tensor,
     use ``torch.*_like`` tensor creation ops
     (see :ref:`tensor-creation-ops`).
   - To create a tensor with similar type but different size as another tensor,
     use ``tensor.new_*`` creation ops.

```

Is all the content in [this doc file](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/tensors.html) written by hand?

Thank you!
